availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
The State of Ohio
County of Hamilton } Sct
City of Cincinnati

I -- Alexander H. McGuffey, having been appointed and commissioned by His Excellency Beriah Magoffin, Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky, a Commissioner of Deeds (in Ohio) for the State of Kentucky, for the term of four years from 16" day of January A.D. 1862, -- do swear that I will well and truly Execute and perform all the duties of my station as such Commissioner -- so help me God.

Sworn by the said Alexander H McGuffy before me, and by him subscribed in my presence, at Cincinnati Ohio the 17' day of January 1862, as witness my hand, and Notarial seal affixed, on the day and year aforesaid.
